xml:
Zyclara<tm tmtype="reg"/> Indications and dose

Actinic keratosis

To the skin

  • Adult

    Apply once daily for 2 weeks, to be applied at bedtime to lesion on face or balding scalp, repeat course after a 2-week treatment-free interval, assess response 8 weeks after second course; maximum 2 sachets per day.

 Directions for administration

Important

Should be rubbed in and allowed to stay on the treated area for 8 hours, then washed off with mild soap and water.
Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
